subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A Dallas man charged along with the former N.F.L. player Sam Hurd pleaded guilty Friday to attempting to buy several kilograms of cocaine in hopes of establishing a large-scale drug distribution network.
snippet: A Dallas man charged along with the former N.F.L. player Sam Hurd pleaded guilty Friday to attempting to buy several kilograms of cocaine in hopes of establishing a large-scale drug distribution network.
